title: [Large-Scale] AI-Based Blended Learning Program for Advanced Mandarin Pronunciation Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Vocabulary and Grammar Proficiency at HSK Level 5 or Above, with Basic Tonal Awareness
context.additional_context: Practical language proficiency enhancement program for working professionals. Strengthens self-directed learning through personal device utilization and AI systems

learning_goals: Learners can pronounce sentences, including advanced tone changes (e.g., hard/soft tones, tonal neutralization), with 90% accuracy within four weeks.
Achieve a comprehensive AI system evaluation score of 85+ points (pronunciation, speed, intonation).
Improve at least three personal weak pronunciation items through self-directed repetitive practice three or more times per week.

resources: BLCU AI pronunciation evaluation system license

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
